title: List of all Android dynamic  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android dynamic  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: tinker
repoList.description: Tinker is a hot-fix solution library for Android, it supports dex, library and resources update without reinstall apk.

repoList.name: android-dynamical-loading
repoList.description: 🔌 Android plugin development library (Frontia) and tech introductions, which means that you can upgrade your Android APP or fix emergent bugs, as well as reduce the file size of Apk without any re-installation.

repoList.name: Prism
repoList.description: A dynamic colouring library for Android

repoList.name: Dynamicbox
repoList.description: Android library to show Loading view when waiting for initial state

repoList.name: SpeedView
repoList.description: Dynamic Speedometer and Gauge for Android. amazing, powerful, and multi shape :zap:

repoList.name: transitioner
repoList.description: A library for dynamic view-to-view transitions

repoList.name: dynamic-support
repoList.description: A complete library to build Android apps with a built-in theme engine.

repoList.name: dynamic-toasts
repoList.description: Custom toasts with color and icon for Android.

repoList.name: DynamicAnimationExample
repoList.description: A simple spring  animation (support library v25.3.0+) example android app

repoList.name: Grab-n-Run
repoList.description: Grab’n Run, a simple and effective Java Library for Android projects to secure dynamic code loading.
